text: I'll Get You for This is a 1951 British crime thriller movie directed by Joseph M. Newman and based on the 1946 novel of the same name by James Hadley Chase. It stars George Raft, Coleen Gray, Enzo Staiola, Charles Goldner, Walter Rilla, Peter Illing, Elwyn Brook-Jones and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 crime movies Category:1950s thriller movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Joseph M. Newman Category:British crime movies
title: I'll Get You for This
